name: Angular Content Management System
description: Build content management system using Angular
prompt:
Create a content management system with:
- Article creation and editing
- Media library management
- User roles and permissions
- Content scheduling
- SEO optimization tools
- Analytics integration
- Multi-language support
- Template system
- Comment moderation
- Mobile-responsive admin

Requirements:
- Rich text editor
- File upload system
- User authentication
- Content workflow
- SEO features
expected_features: Complete implementation of all specified features

name: Angular Event Management Platform
description: Build event management platform using Angular
prompt:
Create an event management platform with:
- Event creation and scheduling
- Ticketing system
- Attendee registration
- Calendar integration
- Venue management
- Speaker profiles
- Sponsor management
- Live streaming
- Mobile app
- Payment processing

Requirements:
- Calendar integration
- Payment processing
- Real-time updates
- Mobile optimization
- Social features
expected_features: Complete implementation of all specified features

name: Angular Customer Support Portal
description: Build customer support portal using Angular
prompt:
Create a customer support portal with:
- Ticket submission system
- Knowledge base
- Live chat support
- FAQ management
- User account management
- Support analytics
- Email notifications
- File attachments
- Multi-language support
- Mobile optimization

Requirements:
- Real-time chat
- Ticket management
- Knowledge base
- User authentication
- Mobile design
expected_features: Complete implementation of all specified features
